Time-Sensitive Logic.lockInGuess: Records the block number at the time of guess and increments by 1 for the target block.
Time-Sensitive Logic.settle: Depends on block.number advancing past guesses[msg.sender].block for the settlement to proceed.

Settlement Path: If the guess matches the block hash, 2 Ether is transferred.
If the guess does not match, no Ether is transferred and the userâ€™s guess is reset.
